snippet.title: 7 Days - Early Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Playtests have officially begun!

! Epilepsy Warning: Flashing Lights !
Discover the strange world you've gotten yourself in and accept your trauma's and regrets. With a hand-drawn artstyle, atmospheric music and a creative vision.

This is an early gameplay video after 3 months of progress! We've just started playtests, and I wanted to showcase what I've made so far!
About 1-4 of the game is complete, including around 30 minutes of content.

Join our Discord for progress updates!
https://discord.gg/bAT7S5NZZ5

X: https://x.com/Industries_IC
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/sevendays/907909
